Q: Rephrased Question: What are the key features of ABSLI assured savings plan?"
A:
Response: 
Key Features Of ABSLI Assured Savings Plan:
🔍 Guaranteed Maturity Beneﬁt: Receive a lump sum payout at policy maturity to cater to your life's milestones, worry-free.
📈 ABSLI Assured Savings Plan At A Glance: Get an overview of the product specifications, type of plan, coverage, benefit option, premium payment term (PPT), and policy term (PT).
💰 Tax Beneﬁts: You may be entitled to certain applicable tax beneﬁts on premiums paid and on beneﬁt(s) received under your policy.
📊 How Does ABSLI Assured Savings Plan Work For You? Case Study for Lumpsum Beneﬁt Option: Mr. Sharma, aged 35 years, invests in ABSLI Assured Savings Plan and chooses the following at inception: Premium Paying Term: 8 years | Policy Term: 16 years | Premium Payment Mode: Annual | Annualized Premium: ` 100,000.

Note: The bolded parts of the response are the key features of ABSLI assured savings plan mentioned in the given context.
